works.title: Amaris
works.description: Renovation of the AXA Group web portal within the company's technology department. This was an international project with clients from countries as Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates and Greece.

works.title: Hiberus Tecnolog√≠a
works.description: Project with the Spanish public television (RTVE) where I collaborated with the innovation department in the development of web and hybrid applications. I also participated in the design of the content of the public portal.

works.title: Grupo Octilus S.L.
works.description: Responsible for the design and layout of ecommerce about mobile accessories. I was also managing the content of the portal.
